  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Inventori ed invenzioni Europee</string>
            <string language="en">European Inventions and Inventors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Erfindungen und Erfinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inventions européennes et inventeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Invenções européias e inventores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκοί εφευρέσεις και εφευρέτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Invenciones europeas e inventores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO suggerisce uno studio dell'apprendimento-insegnamento  e della dimensione interculturale della tecnologia attraverso l'esame di numerosi contributi ad opera di scienziati ed inventori dei diversi paesi europei. Sarà anche possibile imparare diversi concetti tecnologici e scientifici e conoscere artefatti attraverso una pratica della lettura in lingua inglese.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO suggests teaching/learning science and technology intercultural dimension through the study of several contributions made by scientists and inventors from different European countries. They will also learn different scientific and technological concepts and artefacts while practicing English reading.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE schlägt teaching/learning 
Wissenschaft und interkulturelles Maß der Technologie durch die 
Studie einiger Beiträge vor, die von den Wissenschaftlern und von den
Erfindern von den unterschiedlichen europäischen Ländern gebildet 
werden. Sie erlernen auch unterschiedliche wissenschaftlichen 
und technologischen Konzepte und die Kunstprodukte beim Üben des 
englischen Messwertes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS suggère la science de teaching/learning 
et la dimension interculturelle de technologie par l'étude de 
plusieurs contributions apportées par des scientifiques et des 
inventeurs à partir de différents pays européens. Ils 
apprendront également différents concepts et objets façonnés 
scientifiques et technologiques tout en pratiquant la lecture 
anglaise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO sugere a ciência de teaching/learning e
a dimensão intercultural da tecnologia com o estudo de diversas 
contribuições feitas por cientistas e por inventores dos países 
europeus diferentes. Aprenderão também conceitos diferentes e 
artefacts científicos e technological ao praticar a leitura inglesa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO προτείνει/επιστήμη και τεχνολογία 
εκμάθησης διαπολιτισμική διάσταση μέσω της μελέτης διάφορων 
συνεισφορών που γίνονται από τους επιστήμονες και τους εφευρέτες 
από τις διαφορετικές ευρωπαϊκές χώρες. Θα μάθουν επίσης 
τις διαφορετικά επιστημονικά και τεχνολογικά έννοιες και τα 
χειροποίητα αντικείμενα εν ενεργεία την αγγλική ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO sugiere ciencia de teaching/learning y 
la dimensión intercultural de la tecnología con el estudio de varias
contribuciones hechas por los científicos y los inventores de 
diversos países europeos. También aprenderán diversos 
conceptos y los artefactos científicos y tecnológicos mientras que 
practican la lectura inglesa.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">U-U</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usatom in differenti situazioni secondo l'età ed il grado di conoscenza degli studenti e la loro competenza della lingua inglese. Questa lezione richiede circa tre ore. Gli studenti lavorano in gruppi di 2-3. Esaminano tutto il quiz e provano a rispondere alle domande. In caso di dubbio, possono usare i siti suggeriti come fonte di informazione su scienziati  e tecnologi europei e sul loro contributo alla scienza e alla tecnologia. 2. Gli studenti valutano i loro risultati di apprendimento  attraverso lo svolgimento del quiz. 3. Basandosi sui siti suggeriti, ogni gruppo di studenti può preparare un testo su uno scienziato(vita e opere) di un diverso paese, che poi sarà condiviso con la classe.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO can be used in different settings accordingly with students’ age and knowledge of English. This lesson takes about 3 hours.
1. Students work in groups of 2-3. They go through the quizzes and try to answer the questions. In case of any doubt, they can use the suggested sites as a source of information about European scientists and technologists and their contributions to science and technology.
2. Students evaluate their learning results by doing the quizzes.
3. Based on the suggested sites, each group of students can prepare a paper, on a scientist (her/his life and work) from a different country, that will be shared with the class.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
